quote: There's no heaven as I had known before. It's just a great universe which is available to be enjoyed by souls who dream about it.
author: Toba Beta,  Betelgeuse Incident: Insiden Bait Al-Jauza

quote: God wanted to make heaven and the earth is that heaven. Nowhere in the universe there is so much love, life, beauty and peace. Enjoy your stay with the fellow beings.
author: Amit Ray,  Nonviolence: The Transforming Power

quote: This is heaven my child.
author: Santosh Kalwar

quote: Heaven would never be heaven without you.
author: Richard Matheson,  What Dreams May Come

quote: Let this hell be our heaven.
author: Richard Matheson,  What Dreams May Come

quote: Spread kindness, caring, and compassion and create your own paradise. Infuse it with joy and you’ve created heaven on earth.
author: Amy Leigh Mercree

quote: Heaven is comfort, but it's still not living.
author: Alice Sebold,  The Lovely Bones

quote: When I die, I hope to go to Heaven, whatever the Hell that is.
author: Ayn Rand

quote: Heaven can be found in the most unlikely corners.
author: Mitch Albom,  The Five People You Meet in Heaven - Meniti Bianglala

quote: Heaven [10w] Heaven’s not a destination ~it’s a way of processing life.
author: Beryl Dov

quote: Nothing but heaven itself is better than a friend who is really a friend.
author: Plautus

quote: Eyes of Heaven To see through the eyes of heavenis to look upon your fellow manand only see the good in him.
author: Beryl Dov

quote: I am in an altogether new world now. I can think of nothing more wonderful. It is a real touch of all that heaven means.
author: Laura Hillenbrand,  Unbroken: A World War II Story of Survival, Resilience, and Redemption

quote: To see a World in a grain of sand,And a Heaven in a wild flower,Hold Infinity in the palm of your hand,And Eternity in an hour.
author: William Blake,  Auguries of Innocence

quote: Piece of Heaven?""No, that other place I'm going to go to for thinking what I'm thinking.
author: Richelle Mead,  The Indigo Spell

quote: A kiss on the beach when there is a full moon is the closest thing to heaven.
author: H. Jackson Brown Jr.

quote: Kitten, your hands are heaven and your eyes are my home.
author: Jeaniene Frost,  This Side of the Grave

quote: If there are no dogs in Heaven, then when I die I want to go where they went.
author: Will Rogers

quote: To see a World in a Grain of Sand And a Heaven in a Wild Flower, Hold Infinity in the palm of your hand And Eternity in an hour.
author: William Blake,  Auguries of Innocence

quote: Heaven grant us patience with a man in love.
author: Rudyard Kipling

quote: Through the darkest hours of the nightand through the dreamers realm I seek,Far beyond the starry skyand beyond galaxies I am free.Through the grimmest memoriesand past a seasons air I cannot breathe,Far beyond this mortal worldin an afterlife we shall meet.
author: Lee Argus

quote: I think Heaven will be like a first kiss.
author: Sarah Addison Allen,  The Sugar Queen

quote: Death! Strange that there should be such a word, and such a thing, and we ever forget it; that one should be living, warm and beautiful, full of hopes, desires and wants, one day, and the next be gone, utterly gone, and forever!
author: Harriet Beecher Stowe,  Uncle Tom's Cabin

quote: Just like heaven. Ever’body wants a little piece of lan’. I read plenty of books out here. Nobody never gets to heaven, and nobody gets no land. It’s just in their head. They’re all the time talkin’ about it, but it’s jus’ in their head.
author: John Steinbeck,  Of Mice and Men

quote: Our heaven is their hell, said God. I like a balanced universe.
author: Margaret Atwood,  The Tent

quote: In heaven, all the interesting people are missing.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: Where there is love there is life.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: Heaven is an idea constructed by man to help him cope with the fact that life on earth is both brutally short and, paradoxically, far too long.
author: Andrew Davidson,  The Gargoyle

quote: The place God calls you to is the place where your deep gladness and the world’s deep hunger meet.
author: Frederick Buechner,  Wishful Thinking: A Theological ABC

quote: After all, is not a real Hell better than a manufactured Heaven?
author: E.M. Forster,  Maurice

quote: We see a hearse; we think sorrow. We see a grave; we think despair. We hear of a death; we think of a loss. Not so in heaven. When heaven sees a breathless body, it sees the vacated cocoon & the liberated butterfly.
author: Max Lucado,  Max on Life: Answers and Insights to Your Most Important Questions

quote: Ah, but a man's reach should exceed his grasp,Or what's a heaven for?
author: Robert Browning,  Men and Women and Other Poems

quote: The connections we make in the course of a life--maybe that's what heaven is.
author: Fred Rogers

quote: The mind is its own place, and in itself can make a heaven of hell, a hell of heaven..
author: John Milton,  Paradise Lost

quote: Wherever the hope of glory lives, hopelessness passes away.
author: Nadine C. Keels,  The Song of Nadine

quote: God created heaven on earth but man created hell.
author: Santosh Kalwar,  Quote Me Everyday

quote: Where does your soul go, when you die in Hell?
author: Ursula K. Le Guin,  The Dispossessed

quote: Wherever you are, be there with love.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: To be saved is here, local and mortal
author: A.R. Ammons

quote: wherever you find the greatest good, you will find the greatest evil, because evil loves paradise as much as good.
author: Wallace Stegner,  All the Little Live Things

quote: Wherever you go, never forget to be the messenger and cause of happiness.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Vacations for Souls [10w] When souls are bored in Heaven they vacation in Hell.
author: Beryl Dov

quote: If people were employed at creating heaven on earth, everybody would be happy; instead each one is creating his own heaven by creating hell for others.
author: Bangambiki Habyarimana,  The Great Pearl of Wisdom

quote: Love, and you shall be loved.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: They say some couples are joined in heaven, and on Earth they look for their partner soul to be with.I knew I had found mine in her. And who can fight heaven?
author: Ruth Ahmed,  When Ali Met Honour

quote: Heaven help the roses if the bombs begin to fall
author: Stevie Wonder

quote: A soul that becomes the place where divine grace is harbored and encouraged joins the class of the immortals and lives on into eternal greatness.
author: Garey Gordon,  The Values Pursued Life: Excellence and Greatness from Within

quote: The world is a goddamned evil place, the strong prey on the weak, the rich on the poor; I’ve given up hope that there is a God that will save us all. How am I supposed to believe that there’s a heaven and a hell when all I see now is hell.
author: Aaron B. Powell,  Doomsday Diaries III: Luke the Protector

quote: Christ asks for a home in your soul, where he can be at rest with you, where he can talk easily to you, where you and he, alone together, can laugh and be silent and be delighted with one another.
author: Caryll Houselander,  This War Is the Passion

quote: People often belittle the place where they were born but heaven can be found in the most unlikely places.
author: Mitch Albom,  The Five People You Meet in Heaven
